text: The South American Championship 1953 was a football tournament held in Peru. It was won by Paraguay with Brazil second. Argentina, and Colombia withdrew from the tournament. Francisco Molina from Chile became top scorer of the tournament with 7 goals. == Venues == Lima Estadio Nacional de Lima Capacity: 50,000 == Final round == Team 6 4 0 2 15 6 +9 8 6 3 2 1 11 6 +5 8 6 3 1 2 15 6 +9 7 6 3 1 2 10 10 0 7 6 3 1 2 4 6 −2 7 6 1 1 4 6 15 −9 3 6 0 2 4 1 13 −12 2 \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- Match was awarded to Peru due to unsportsmanlike behaviour of Paraguay by making one extra change.
